main event: A civilian reported seeing a single illuminated object that hovered, changed colors, and blasted from the bottom while accompanied by a blast, in Plattsburg, New York.
interesting points: The object was reported to change colors from red to white to yellow-orange.
The object hovered, backed up, and changed to white and then red.
The object was described as illuminated and accompanied by a blast from the bottom.
The observer was a civilian naval personnel who was in the upper New York state area.
The object appeared to rise and fall in approximately the same position.
